name: S.L.I.M.E
description:
Info
This game was made for the Dani's Basement Game Jam in 5 Days.

Credits
Music by EcrettMusic
Everything else by PolarCube

How to play
A/D or Left/Right Arrow = move around.
W/Space/Up Arrow = Jump
Left/Right Mouse = Shoot gun
Once your slimebar is blue you will consume the next thing you collide with.

Known Bugs
- Sometimes when collecting coins it creates 2 instead of 1
- Some bullets collide with the player and get destroyed

If I had more time
- Online Leaderboard
- Tutorial
- More Enemies
- Sandbox Mode
- Different Levels
- Boss Fight
- Tweaked Bomb Explosion Force
- InGame Lore

Lore
You are playing as a new slime called Bonga, they are made of blue slime.
Blue slime and orange slime mix together well in small increments. If too much orange slime suddenly touches the blue slime. The blue slime explodes it explodes...

If orange and blue slime are mixed perfectly the blue slime will consume the next orange slime it touches and evolve into it.
